rendering a t least fifty-nine male voices perfectly unnecessary.
The Stage, which has been constructed after the approved fashion of the revived Greek Theatre,
will be partially raised, but the prices of admission remain exactly as before. It is also requisite to
observe, that a frequent change of scene being contrary to the usage of the Ancient Greek Drama,

T e represent

VMMJtJ W H O L E R O i i r o r rat:

CHOMUS,

rendering at least fifty-nine male voices perfectly unnecessary.
The Stage, which has been constructed after the approved fashion of the revived Greek Theatre,
will be partially raised, but the prices of admission remain exactly as before. It is also requisite to
observe, that a frequent change of scene being contrary to the usage of the Ancient Greek Drama
several of the most

SPLENDID PICTORIAL EFFECTS
Will be left entirely to the imagination of the audience.
